issue.title: dashboard.twitch.tv
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://dashboard.twitch.tv/u/lynkazoyuu/extensions/manage?configure=true&extensionID=skt182bso1i1ah7dnmkwqkdk26dak4-27.2.0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdashboard.twitch.tv%2Fu%2Flynkazoyuu%2Fextensions%2Fmanage%3Fconfigure%3Dtrue%26extensionID%3Dskt182bso1i1ah7dnmkwqkdk26dak4-27.2.0) ### Comment > This isssue shows itself randomly and sometimes resolves itself, this only applies to specific sites or elements on them where sites dont load at all or partially load, i would have to pause or disable AdGuard to get it working. > > Filters on or off doesnt matter for me just having AdGuard enabled causes the issues. This goes for Ad Blocker, Stealth Mode & DNS Protection. > > To reproduce i dont know if this is possible, but for me i have filters on or off and the settings i sent in before. opera gx latest with defualt settings, it works on other browsers. Username: `@LYNK-INCUU` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/rpm1sapnniocooo4cso8o00cock4sgcuv62ul7wle8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/e85cy0sfgbkkwg4kss800k0gg0osk402e0se96e47m.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/no1s10vhsc0ok8csk40gs4s080gs8ggtnrs4mhplf4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qeqs22gp1r4ggkw4c00k8sokkk84ogo16gtlkkr83p.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gvf9b8a86eos08484kgkwg8o0ss0sc4p6lrqtk47j4.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.18.1 System version: | Windows 10 22H2 Browser: | Opera License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode options: | Block WebRTC,

Block trackers,

Turn off Advertising ID DNS filtering: | server: `Ad`, `Guard`, `DNS`, `DNSCrypt`
filters: `adguard dns filters`, `https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/hagezi/dns-blocklists@latest/adblock/pro.plus.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:

AdGuard URL Tracking

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances Custom filters: | https://github.com/hagezi/dns-blocklists Userscripts: | disabled Other extensions used: | bitdefender, hegezi filters ### Import issue configuration (AdGuard for Windows) [Import](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=adguard%3Aimport_user_configuration%3Furl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fdashboard.twitch.tv%252Fu%252Flynkazoyuu%252Fextensions%252Fmanage%253Fconfigure%253Dtrue%2526extensionID%253Dskt182bso1i1ah7dnmkwqkdk26dak4-27.2.0)

issue.title: radar.weather.gov
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://radar.weather.gov/station/kiln/standard](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fradar.weather.gov%2Fstation%2Fkiln%2Fstandard) ### Comment > I am unable to see current up-to-date weather radar images on radar.weather.gov (National Weather Service website) with AdGuard DNS protection enabled. The image with DNS protection enabled is always a few days out of date. If I disable the DNS protection the feed is correct and current. Note that it is ONLY the DNS protection function that is the problem. The “normal” AdGuard ad blocking and tracking features do not interfere with the image feed. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1jv5bus0x1okowow4c8404gwkk8ggscklr9u0i7qds.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fjbaryl5xnccccsw4kg0o0o484w0k00l5k95fyvhwg.jpg?nc=1)
